author: PTI
title: Mutations undergone by coronavirus tracked, three lineages discovered: Study
description: ​ According to the researchers, including those from the University of Cambridge in the UK, there are three distinct  variants  of COVID-19, consisting of clusters of closely related lineages, which they labelled 'A', 'B' and 'C'.  The closest type of COVID-1…
content:
London: Scientists have reconstructed the early "evolutionary paths" of COVID-19 as the infection spread from Wuhan, out to Europe and North America, an advance that sheds light on the mutations undergone by the novel coronavirus since its origin.
